name: is-uuid
description: Check if a string at a specified path is a valid UUID (any version)

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'user.id')

output.description: true if string is a valid UUID (8-4-4-4-12 format), false if invalid or path doesn't exist or value is not a string
